title: Disabling Champion Select Music
body:
I was trying to disable the champ select music but the "Enable Champion Selection" music checkbox and volume slider did not do anything for me.
It was only when I disabled the log in music that the Champion Selection music cut away and I was able to listen to my own music from Spotify.

This probably is not intentional so I thought I would mention it here.

replies.body:
Hey naznsan

Can you make sure to send in a bug report on this one - it sounds like it might not be working as intended :)

There is a little bug icon on the bottom right of the client you can click to send it in.

Cheers!
Mindstar
